messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory]$B!!(BShuriken
messages.msgSnippet: ... $B%7%h%-!&(B ... $B%O%`%(%1!&!,!&%1(B. It s quite ... I figured that s what happened...sometimes typing in Japanese can be a real pain. I have this
messages.messageBody:
--- Oyakata <oyakata@...> wrote:
> Hahaha. No you're right it's a typo - good catch.
> The two words
> are homophones.
>
> As you say, $B%7%h%-!&(Bis the right word - not
$B%7%h%-!&(B
>
> This is a kind of typo called
$B%O%`%(%1!&!,!&%1(B. It's quite
> easy to do
> (although it is sloppy and I shouldn't have done it)
> when typing
> in Japanese.

I figured that's what happened...sometimes typing in
Japanese can be a real pain. I have this problem
sending messages on my cellphone all the time...
